user.description: Apache Fortress Demo User123 Access all Pages for Customer 123
Apache Fortress Demo User456 Access all Pages for Customer 456
Apache Fortress Demo User789 Access all Pages for Customer 789

role.name: DEMO2_USER
role.description: Grants User login access to this Web application

role.name: ROLE_DEMO2_SUPER_USER
role.description: Grants User access to all three Pages

role.name: DEMO2_ALL_PAGES
role.description: Grants User ability to switch between Pages

role.name: ROLE_PAGE1
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 1 and its Buttons

role.name: PAGE1_123
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 1 and its Buttons for Customer 123

role.name: PAGE1_456
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 1 and its Buttons for Customer 456

role.name: PAGE1_789
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 1 and its Buttons for Customer 789

role.name: ROLE_PAGE2
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 2 and its Buttons

role.name: PAGE2_123
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 2 and its Buttons for Customer 123

role.name: PAGE2_456
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 2 and its Buttons for Customer 456

role.name: PAGE2_789
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 2 and its Buttons for Customer 789

role.name: ROLE_PAGE3
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 3 and its Buttons

role.name: PAGE3_123
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 3 and its Buttons for Customer 123

role.name: PAGE3_456
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 3 and its Buttons for Customer 456

role.name: PAGE3_789
role.description: Grants User Access to Page 3 and its Buttons for Customer 789
